titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the H.E Butti Bin Bishr Collection AD.MC.093
titlestmt.author: Jasmine Soliman and Emily Broad

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-07-25 22:04:41 +0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: H.E Butti Bin Bishr Collection

physdesc.extent: 470 loose photographic prints, 1 negative and 7 albums containing 252 photographic prints. Mainly colour photographs with some black and white. Some with significant curling or warping, but none that prohibit digitization.
36 letters, memos, certificates and ID documents

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: A (digital surrogate) collection of 723 photographs and 36 related documents from the collection of H.E. Butti Bin Bishr, created and collected during his time working in the court of H.H. Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan in the 1960s and early 1970s.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: HE Butti Bin Bishr, who was born on Muharram 21, 1360 AH (May 18, 1941 AD), passed away on Rabi al Awwal 1432 (February 22, 2011). After working as the director of the Oman Bank in Al Ain, HE Butti Bin Bishr occupied a number of different administrative positions at the court of the late HH Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan, before becoming private secretary and then the director of his Office.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) are held by Maryam Al Falasi, the collection owner. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from them via the repository. Please contact Akkasah: Photography Archive at NYUAD at akkasah@nyu.edu or complete the image request form at akkasah.org

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Digital surrogates only are held by the repository. Please contact Akkasah Photography Archive, akkasah@nyu.edu +971 2628 5531

did.unittitle: Diplomatic and Political Engagements of the UAE 1972
The front cover of "Diplomatic and Political Engagements of the UAE 1972."
The inside front cover of "Diplomatic and Political Engagements of the UAE 1972."
An advertisement page in an Apples Self-Adhesive Album.
The index of "Diplomatic and Political Engagements of the UAE 1972."

Top: From the left around the table: H.E. Khalaf Bin Ahmed Al Otaiba, H.E. Ahmed Al Hamed, H.E. Ahmed Bin Haisa Al Saeedi, H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan, Sheikh Ahmed bin Ali Al Thani of Qatar, Emir Sheikh Issa bin Salman Al Khalifa of Bahrain (check this) at a conference concerning the unification of the United Arab Emirates. Bottom: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan (left) with Sheikh Ahmad bin Ali Al Thani of Qatar (right) at a conference concerning the unification of the United Arab Emirates.

Top: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan with Sheikh Ahmed bin Ali Al Thani of Qatar (right) at a conference concerning the unification of the United Arab Emirates. Bottom: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan (left) with Emir Issa bin Salman Al Khalifa of Bahrain at a gathering.

From the left: H.E. Maolum Al Otaiba, an official in the Abu Dhabi government, H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan shaking hands with Jaafar Nimeiri, and an unidentified man at the reception of the Sudanese delegation in the UAE.
Jaafar Nimeiri and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr embracing in a crowd during the arrival of the Sudanese delegation in the UAE.
A group portrait including H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr on a personal trip in Murree, Pakistan.

From the top left clockwise: a crowd of men gathered for the arrival of the Sudanese delegation to the UAE; a group portrait of H.E. Butti Bin Bishr, H.E. Ahmed Al Hamed, and an unidentified man; and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr embracing Jaafar Nimeiry.

Top: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan with Emira Issa bin Salman Al Khalifa of Bahrain, with coffee and beverages on the table. Bottom: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan walking with Jaafar Nimeiri next the Abu Dhabi military.

Top: From the left: H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (middle) and two other men performing at an Al Ayala dance. Bottom: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan waving to a crowd of people during the arrival of Jaafar Nimeiry.
From the top left clockwise: two views of performances to celebrate the arrival of the Emirati Delegation abroad, and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (middle) talking with a man.

From the top left clockwise: a group of school girls dancing with the UAE and Kuwaiti flag to celebrate the opening of a new school; a woman and man performing in costumes at the reception of the Emirati Delegation abroad; H.E. Sheikh Mubarak Bin Hamed Al Nayhan, H.E. Sheikh Tahnoon, H.E. Butti Bin Bishr, and an unidentified man performing at an Al Ayala dance.

From the top down: a gate with a welcoming message for Sheikh Zayed, H.E. Butti Bin Bishr flipping through a book in his office in Al Ain, From the left: H.E. Ahmed Al Nasroud, H.E. Butti Bin Bishr greeting Emir Issa bin Salman Al Khalifa of Bahrain, and H.E. Ahmed Al Hamed (middle) at the Abu Dhabi Airport.

From the top left clockwise: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan receiving a bouquet during the UAE visit to Syria, with H.E. Ahmed Al Hamed, H.E. Sheikh Mubarak Al Nayhan, and Hafez Al-Assad behind Sheikh Zayed; members of the Syrian military receiving H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan; and H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan with Hafez Al-Assad.

From the top down: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan with a president during the UAE visit to Syria; H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan being received by Hafez Al-Assad in a crowd, including H.E. Khalfan Al Romaithi, H.E. Hamed Al Suwaidi, H.E. Ahmed Al Hamed, H.E. Sheikh Mubarak Al Nayhan, H.E. Butti Bin Bishr; and the Sudanese and Emirati delegations at a dinner gathering for Sudan's visit to the UAE.
From the top left clockwise: two views of performers in costumes performing a play, and a mosque with hills in the background.

From the top down: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan with a representative of the Bahraini government arriving to Bahrain, with H.E. Sheikh Mubarak Bin Hamed and H.E. Khalfan Al Romaithi behind them; H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan with a representative of the Bahraini government; and a group of men including H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (second from the left) with H.E. Ahmed Bin Sulayem and members of the Syrian delegation in Syria.

From the top down: From the left: H.E. Sheikh Al Maktoum, Saif Al Gharir H.E. Buti Bin Bishr, and an unidentified man; From the left: H.E. Ahmed Bin Sulayem, H.E. Khalfan Al Romaithi, H.E. Saeed Al Darmaki, H.E. Ahmed Al Hamed arriving at the airport in Syria; and H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan with Hafez Al-Assad at the Syrian reception of the Emirati Delegation.

From the top left clockwise: H.E. Butti Bin Bishr with an unidentified man in a foreign country, a man performing for the UAE arrival to their country, and H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan saluting in front of an airplane upon his arrival to a country.

From the top down: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan and the delegation of Abu Dhabi arriving in a country; Hafez Al-Assad gifting H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan a medal, with H.E. Saeed Al Darmaki in the middle; and H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan standing with Jaafar Nimeiri.

From the top left clockwise: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan and Jaafar Nimeiri performing Al Ayala, H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan having a private meeting with Hafez Al-Assad in Syria, a group of men including H.E. Butti Bin Bishr in his office in Al Ain, and a group of men performing the Al Ayala dance.

From the top left clockwise: H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan with Emir Issa bin Salman Al Khalifa of Bahrain, Jafaar Nimeiry with H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan, H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan greeting the delegation of Syria during the UAE's arrival to the country, with Hafez Al-Assad to the left of Sheikh Zayed and H.E. Khalfan Al Romaithi behind Sheikh Zayed.
The inside back cover of "Diplomatic and Political Engagements of the UAE 1972."
The back cover of "Diplomatic and Political Engagements of the UAE 1972."
H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr's Personal Trip to Murree, Pakistan 1970
H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan (middle) and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (right) riding horses with a group of guards.

H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan entering a car during his trip to Murree, Pakistan, with H.E. Ahmed Bin Sulayem (right of Zayed), Mohamed Birawiye Al Hariri (behind Zayed, left), Abd Al Jadid Fahim (behind Sulayem), and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (on stairs on the right, wearing white) in the background.
H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan (left) and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (right) on a lawn.
H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan (right) and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (second from the left) with a group of men.
From the left: H.E. Ahmed Bin Sulayem, Abd Al Jadid Fahim, Mohamed Birawiye Al Hariri, and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr sitting under an umbrella with a platter of fruit.
H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan (left) and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (second from the right) riding horses with a group of guards.
H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan (left, front) and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (right, front) sitting on a lawn with a group of guards.
H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan (left) and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (right) playing carrom.
H.E. Butti Bin Bishr with a telescope on a lawn next to Pakistani guards.
H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (right) with three unidentified men in front of a helicopter in Murree, Pakistan.
H.H. Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nayhan (left) and H.E. Butti Bin Bishr (right) on a lawn.
H.E. Butti Bin Bishr riding a horse guided by a Pakistani guard.
H.E. Butti Bin Bishr riding a horse guided by a Pakistani guard.
H.E. Butti Bin Bishr riding a horse guided by a Pakistani guard.
